question: Effective size of the aggregate is the

answers.a: Maximum particle size of the smallest 30% of the aggregate
answers.b: Maximum particle size of the smallest 10% of the aggregate
answers.c: Maximum particle size of the smallest 60% of the aggregate

question: Sieving should be done by rotating the sieve and not by translation.
Open gradation refers an aggregate sample with
The fineness modulus is calculated by adding the percentages by mass retained on each of a specified series of sieves and dividing the sum by 100.
